historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1177.5.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary addition of subchapter, see note to § 2-223.01.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-223.01.

DC CODE § 2-223.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The institution of a civil action pursuant to § 2-223.03(a) shall preclude an employee from pursuing any administrative remedy for the same cause of action from an arbitrator pursuant to a negotiated grievance and arbitration procedure or an employment contract.

No civil action shall be brought, pursuant to § 2-223.03(a) if the aggrieved employee has had a final determination on the same cause of action from an arbitrator pursuant to a negotiated grievance and arbitration procedure or an employment contract.

subchapter.text: Employees of District Contractors and Instrumentality Whistleblower Protection.
